pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PKI Express for PythonPackage for using PKI Express on PythonThe recommend way to install **PKI Express for Python** is through [PyPi](https://pypi.org/): $ pip install pkiexpressOr informing on your project's `requirements.txt` file: pkiexpress==1.10.0## Documentationhttps://docs.lacunasoftware.com/en-us/articles/pki-express/python## SamplesPlease visit the [PKI Express samples repository](https://github.com/LacunaSoftware/PkiExpressSamples/tree/master/Python)for examples on how to use this library.
